reviews.review:
game makes you think outside the box. not too hard, but did have to look up walkthroughs on 4 stages. I was able to complete the game in a little under 3 hours.

overall very good game, but sad when you haft to sacrifice your companion cube.

I love portal and have played through more than half of the entire portal 2 game on my X-Box 360, I really recommend this strategy game and would love to hear from others who enjoy this game as much as I do!
Neat song at the end, what more is there to say that hasn't already been said. Such a good game, story and universe
BEST GAME EVER now i want to play the 2nd one

FUN GAME =, GOOD FOR PRICE
This is a really fun game, I think that it was at a really good price when it was $2 but I would still buy it anyway even if it was not on the discount ($10) 
The only problem is that you need a high iq, (Like me of course) to beat the game...

It took me a while to try out Portal, I just didn't think a puzzle game of this size was worth playing
I was wrong, amazing game.
I love this game. It is old yet timeless, and the concept is simple yet sophisticated. This is a must buy game.
As long as you dont play the challenge maps, you are gonna have fun with this game.

Ho iniziato a giocare questa saga e mi √® piaciuta tantissima il gioco anche se del 2000 ha una grafica decente e i puzle sono facili ma divertenti.
Da prendere sia il primo che il due.
P.S i livelli advanced  sono molto difficili.
very well thought out puzzles, good graphics for 2007

I don't know if I will get cake, but I DEFINITELY know, that I have the 24hour jamming radio.

If I ever get to become a experimental physicist, my moto will be: "I have research to do, and I'M STILL ALIVE"!

i play this game EVERY day, i have THOUSANDS of hours on record i RECCOMEND THIS GAME SO MUCH, literally 6k hours on this game its so good i love it so much plus i got it for very cheap on sale for a dollar or 2
It's not as fun at portal 2, but its still really good! the graphics and puzzles are amazing!
I LOVE THIS GAME SO MUCH PLEASE PLAY IT EVEN IF YOU NEED TO PAY  ITS GOOD ITS NOT A WASTE OF MONEY
best puzzle game of all time

Jogo Muito Foda, Melhor Jogo de Puzzle que J√° Joguei (obs: compra na promo√ß√£o que vale mais a pena)

Never played this game before until now, I can see why everyone loves this game now. I recommend buying this game and the second one without any second thoughts. (PS. Also play Portal 1st for best experience)
I loved how such a simple concept of a game can have such a turn on how things work
i have no idea how to write reviews but i beat this game on ps3 and this brang back many memories.
Klas igra prasol bystra z 3 cisa

It is just as good as Portal too (Personaly i like Portal 2 more :D) At some parts its hard but the gameplay, story,
dabing, dialogs, graphics and sounds covers it :D
bit to easy finished in 2 hours

Soy muy fan de Portal 1 y 2 y mi pastel de cumplea√±os fu√© el pastel de Portal cuando lo conoc√≠ ü•∞ quiero probar todos los mods de ambos juegos tambi√©n, amo las torretas y a GLaDOS üòçüòçüòçüòç
The puzzles are challenging in a good way.  I love the story.  Also some of the dialogue is funny.  I would definitely recommend it to those who love the sci-fi genre and are good at solving puzzles.

I would definitely recommend this game to everyone who is willing to play a puzzle game. It is fun and fairly challenging, but not too hard. I can't really say anything about the graphics since I had to play on low since I have a very low-end pc, but they still looked good and ran excellent. It is also quite cheap when it is on sale and I love the atmosphere the game gives off. The underground lab is just so cool to me.

A truly classic game, and one i have personally come back to multiple times (on multiple platforms as well). Can be completed in less then two hours, if you know what you're doing. The wonderful puzzle design, eerie atmosphere, and fun portal gun more than make up for the length though.
its a good game, i like sticking myself in infinite portal loops
Cool game. I played it before so I could go through the main game pretty fast but there's mods that add new sets of test chambers which is cool
a game that makes you think without boring you to death.

I'm late to the party on this one, but this game is clever. This puzzle game play loop is so addicting, I couldn't stop...so I didn't. Finished it in a day. Just challenging enough to be rewarding but not too difficult to get you frustrated to just want to turn it off.
Imagine you're probably best developer on the planet, ever. And you don't want to make games, so everyone hates you. Funny isn't it?
loved the challenge. First time playing this game ever and boy have I been sleeping on it for too long!
good game, i hate chocolate cake now.
Love the game. played on ps3 way back when. loved revisiting it. final room is a bit glitchy though.  stands the test of time for me.

After coming back after years, the only flaw is how short the game is! If you get a few hours and have never played this game before this is a must play. You can beat in in under 11 hours without looking up too much, and you have fun doing it. This game is cheap and does go on sell quite a lot so pick it up when you can.
Impossible to dislike as long as you play this game before Portal 2; otherwise, the game might feel lacking.
GOOD GAME, IT MADE ME SHORT BUT VERY ENTERTAINING AND INTERESTING. NOW I'LL PLAY THE SECOND PART.

A pesar del tiempo que ha pasado desde que salio este juego sigue siendo una obra de arte, entreteniendo de la misma manera desde que lo prob√© la primera vez, una historia no muy relevante en el primer juego pero se compensa bastante en el segundo.
Es un juego con una mec√°nica simple y en cierto modo f√°cil de dominar pero cada vez d√°ndote desaf√≠os mas dif√≠ciles.
Es corto y se puede pasar entre 2 a 4 horas aproximadamente si lo juegas por primera vez, ya que te estrujara un poco el cerebro encontrarte con este tipo de puzzles por primera vez siendo una necesidad indispensable el desplazamiento de tu personaje y objetos entre portales.
B√°sicamente, es un juego que no dura tanto, y que no te adentras mucho en la historia (en esta entrega); a pesar de esto es uno de los mejores juegos que yo y muchos han probado, y es completamente recomendado adquirirlo (aunque recomiendo esperar un poco a los descuentos), y cuando los atrape el arte de los portales les animo a conseguir la segunda entrega (pueden comprar los 2 juegos a un menor precio en un paquete hecho por Valve).

Este jogo √© o melhor jogo da hist√≥ria.
simplesmente perfeito.
incr√≠vel.
a historia √© legal, mas o asta n tem ent o jogo √© ruim
Muito bem feito, nossa que TOP

Anyone who likes video games, this is one of those games everyone should play at least once at one point in their lives, especially if they like puzzles and sci-fi.  Buy this when it goes on sale, I'd recommend buying it in the bundle with Portal 2. 
 They're both good and you save extra money.

Portal 1 is a good, tight, basic puzzle game revolving around portals.  While Portal 2 is like a puzzle game inside of a story, Portal 1 is like a story inside of a puzzle game if that makes sense.  Portal 1 you can kind of play whatever levels you want and mostly forget about the story (not that Portal 2 is bad it's fantastic too).  No boring tutorials although you'll learn along the way and pick things up fairly easily.  Just get in there you'll have fun.
Lil short but fun the whole way.
Woo. Go through the portal of magic.
